NodePing server monitoring service is extending a special Christmas offer to the LET community.

15-day free trial to get you started.  If you like it, pay for 6 months and we'll throw in an extra month of service for free.  It applies to any of our monitoring plans, which start at $8/month. [Sign up using this link](https://nodeping.com?rid=NodePing-8C43 "NodePing website monitoring").

Our service includes unlimited international SMS and voice alerts as well as 18 check types including RBL, SMTP, and SSH. In addition to monitoring from North America and Europe, we're launching  a new monitoring region (East Asia/Oceania) in January.

Now go get some eggnog... we'll watch your websites and servers.

Merry Christmas to all.
